data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
I have not found such similiar modules which supports a
    schema-based development, e.g. you merely need to write one schema
    in Perl hash style, and the system will generate all modules,
    including their internal relationship for you. I did find some CPAN
    modules which only support to generate the methods of module
    independantly from another module.
